raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added `SearchPageTransformer` for `/en/search` pages, generating minimal markdown with title and API example
- Registered new transformer in global registry
- Expanded `TocTransformer` to support homepage and product pages (in addition to categories/subcategories)
